org.qi4j.spi.entitystore

Interface StateChangeListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ElasticSearchIndexer, ESClusterIndexQueryService, ESFilesystemIndexQueryService, ESMemoryIndexQueryService, PostgreSQLService, RdfIndexingEngineService, RdfIndexingService, SolrQueryService, SQLIndexingEngineService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElasticSearchIndexer.Mixin, RdfIndexingService.RdfEntityIndexerMixin, SolrEntityIndexerMixin, SQLStateChangeListener

    public interface StateChangeListener
    Implement this interface in a Service if you want it to listen to changes from EntityStores.
